author: Richmbrm
message: General update since re indexing and dedupe of dbs
aiSummary: We have updated the system following recent database re-indexing and deduplication efforts.

aiSummary: Updated LLM PDF ingestion and dashboard features based on local changes.

aiSummary: Improved server backend reliability by resolving Ollama connection timeouts.

message: Enable local RAG: Regulatory manual ingestion active

message: Streamline search: Remove external Wikipedia and industry links
aiSummary: Improved search functionality by removing unnecessary external links to reduce clutter and enhance user experience.

author: Richmbrm
message: Enhance AI with Local branding and Copy-to-Clipboard functionality
aiSummary: Released enhanced AI capabilities with localized branding and added copy-to-clipboard functionality.

author: Richmbrm
message: Sync AI summaries and persistent comments to Render
aiSummary: The following changes have been made to synchronize AI-generated summaries with renderable output and persist comments in the system.

message: Add App Summary page and architecture details
aiSummary: Added App Summary page with supporting architecture details.

message: Another Synch to see if latest git push is listed in history v3
aiSummary: Updated version history to include latest Git push in v3.

author: Richmbrm
message: Another Synch to see if latest git push is listed in history v2
aiSummary: Updated synchronization logic to ensure that latest git push event is correctly recorded in the version history.

author: Richmbrm
message: Another Synch to see if latest git push is listed in history
aiSummary: Implemented a sync with Git history to verify inclusion of latest push.

author: Richmbrm
message: Silence render gin logs and sync history manifest
aiSummary: Silenced Gin rendering logs to improve performance and synced the Git history manifest for accurate tracking.

aiSummary: Render updated with latest release history and comments from Git commit.

author: Richmbrm
message: Sync latest release history and comments to Render

author: Richmbrm
message: Freeze full local history manifest for Render deployment
aiSummary: Render deployment now includes full local history manifest frozen at the time of deployment.

author: Richmbrm
message: Deploy bulletproof build-time history manifest for Render
aiSummary: Updated Render with a bulletproof build-time history manifest to improve deployment reliability and integrity.

author: Richmbrm
message: Robust git-history fix for Render production
aiSummary: Improved render production environment with a robust fix to the git history functionality.

author: Richmbrm
message: Fix shallow clone history on Render
aiSummary: Fixed shallow clone issue to improve rendering performance.

author: Richmbrm
message: Implement Jira-style Release History with persistent comments
aiSummary: Released a new feature to display a persistent release history with comments in the repository.

author: Richmbrm
message: Fix BioMistral model identifier mismatch
aiSummary: Fixed a bug causing inconsistent BioMistral model identifiers in the system.

author: Richmbrm
message: Optimize AI search performance and fix result click crash
aiSummary: "Performance optimization and bug fixes to improve AI search functionality."

author: Richmbrm
message: Update walkthrough with connectivity warnings for local LLMs
aiSummary: Updated walkthrough to include connectivity warnings for local Large Language Models (LLMs).

author: Richmbrm
message: Add LLM validation logging and update walkthrough
aiSummary: Implemented LLam validation logging and updated walkthrough features for improved functionality.

author: Richmbrm
message: Integrate Local Ollama LLMs (BioMistral & Llama 3.2)
aiSummary: Integrated Local Ollama Large Language Models (BioMistral and Llama 3.2) into the system.

message: Update README with BETA access and description

aiSummary: Added beta MVP banner version 1.5 to the application.

author: Richmbrm
message: Implement MEP Domain Guard for AI Search
aiSummary: Implemented MEPCoDomainGuard for enhanced AI search functionality in MEP domain.

author: Richmbrm
message: Implement intelligent equipment visibility and local JSON viewing
aiSummary: Improved user interface with enhanced local content display capabilities.

author: Richmbrm
message: Add custom validation message and finalize onboarding UI
aiSummary: Added custom validation messages and finalized the onboarding UI as part of key user interface enhancements.

author: Richmbrm
message: Replace legacy upload with premium onboarding summary
aiSummary: Improved user experience by replacing the outdated legacy upload process with a modern premium onboarding summary.

author: Richmbrm
message: Enforce explicit file selection with placeholder
aiSummary: Explicit file selection now requires a placeholder to prevent unintended modifications.

author: Richmbrm
message: Implement Dual-Method Audit Selection (Server vs Local)
aiSummary: Implemented the ability to select audit methods, allowing users to choose between server-side and local auditing for increased flexibility.

author: Richmbrm
message: UI: Update Run Audit label in index.html
aiSummary: Updated the 'Run Audit' label in the index.html file to improve user experience.

message: Implement Three-Tier AI Knowledge System with Wikipedia integration

message: Fix AI Insight button mapping for expanded standards DB
aiSummary: Updated button mappings to reflect the expanded standards database in AI Insight functionality.

author: Richmbrm
message: Expand AI Standards database with deep technical MEP data
aiSummary: Expanded the AI Standards database to include detailed technical MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing) data.

author: Richmbrm
message: Fix syntax error in main.js causing build failure
aiSummary: Fixed a syntax error in main.js, resulting in a successful rebuild of the application.

message: Make AI search results clickable and interactive

author: Richmbrm
